QuestData.Title: Remember Everfrost!
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you discovered any more everfrost, little $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, little $c.$b$bEverfrost was once plentiful in this region. Over the ages, though, the jormungar devoured nearly all of it. It is now very rare and very precious to my people.$b$bAs you roam these lands, keep a lookout for more pieces of everfrost. Return to me with any that you find and we will be most grateful.
